text: BETTY: I've had to say goodbye
more times and i would have liked
but everyone can see that
and no matter how many times we do it, even when it's for the greater good
it's still stings
CONNOR: You think she bought it?
GUARD: Yeah
CONNOR: I'll have my guy make the deposit today.
BETTY: And though we will never forget what we've given up
we owe it to ourselves to keep moving forward
No, I don't need more "Hilda Time"
You were right it was so i was freaking out
coz I thought how am I going to do this whole
raising a kid being by myself all over again
But now I realize it that I don't have to
coz I have you
what makes you think I am gonna stick around
You. You make me think it.
I guess I must have done something right.
what we can't do is live our lives always afraid of the next goodbye
because chances are
they're not going to stop
I need some inspiration too, you know
the trick is to recognize when a goodbye can be a good thing
when it's a chance to start again
